mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trade(num, userId, subject, content, reg_date, hitCount, type, price, saveFilename, originalFilename) VALUES (trade_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{subject}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 0, #{type}, #{price}, #{saveFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM trade s JOIN member1 m ON s.userId=m.userId
SELECT num, userName, subject, content, hitCount, reg_date, type, price, saveFilename, originalFilename FROM trade s JOIN member1 m ON s.userId=m.userId WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.update: UPDATE trade SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE num=#{num}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT num, subject FROM trade
AND ( num > #{num} )
ORDER BY num ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT num, subject FROM trade
AND ( num < #{num} )
ORDER BY num DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tradeReply(replyNum, num, userId, content, answer, reg_date) VALUES(tradeReply_seq.NEXTVAL, #{num}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{answer}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM tradeReply WHERE num=#{num} AND answer=0
SELECT replyNum, num, r.userId, userName, content, reg_date, answer FROM tradeReply r JOIN member1 m ON r.userId = m.userId WHERE answer = #{answer} ORDER BY replyNum DESC
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM tradeReply WHERE answer = #{answer}
